text: Xanadu is a 1980 American musical fantasy movie directed by Robert Greenwald and starring Olivia Newton-John, Gene Kelly, Michael Beck, Matt Lattanzi, Jo Ann Harris. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was a box office failure. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 fantasy movies Category:1980 musical movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American musical movies
title: Xanadu (movie)
